items.title: How does a Fortune 500 company rebuild their supply chain overnight? Most are piecing together a playbook on the fly
items.description: “Almost every client I talk to has a war room,” says Mary Rollman, KPMG’s U.S. supply chain leader.

items.title: Inside the bond market’s $800 billion ‘murder mystery.’ Here’s why the basis trade could be a time bomb—and what the Fed can do to stop it
items.description: One of Trump’s head economists said the spike in yields added “urgency” to the decision to pause the president’s reciprocal tariffs.

items.title: Trump’s trade war with China begins — and Apple, Tesla, and US stocks are the first major casualties
items.description: Also: Fortune’s 100 Best Companies to Work For, Apple’s supply chain is trapped.

items.title: The no.1 strategy to employ at work as incivility mounts with return to office
items.description: Dr. Becky says we need to stop running from workplace conflict.

items.title: Publishers Clearing House using bankruptcy to pivot away from legacy business of direct-mail, retail merchandise and magazine subscriptions
items.description: The Chapter 11 proceedings, filed in New York on Wednesday, arrive amid growing financial strain for PCH.
